DOC.HEADLINE: PREP FOOTBALL ' 94
DOC.TEXT: Fairfax Lions COACH : Terrel Ray , 3rd year . 1993 RECORD : 6-4 ; 4-3 in Coastal Conference . OUTLOOK : The Lions have a deeper roster , but not as much veteran experience at the skill position . Look_for the team to contend for a playoff spot . University Warriors COACH : Marshall Jones , 2nd year . 1993 RECORD : 5-7 ; 3-4 in Coastal Conference . OUTLOOK : Jones garnered The Times ' 1993 Westside Coach of the Year honors after the Warriors won the Metro League . Marco Pleas , who rushed for more_than 1 # 110 yards , returns as the single back in the Warriors ' offense . Eric Barnes was all-Metro League selection as a defensive back , but may have been the team ' s top receiver . The Warriors are a playoff contender and will most likely complete for the 3-A title . Beverly Hills Normans COACH : Carter Paysinger , 5th year . 1993 RECORD : 2-8 ; 1-3 in Ocean League . OUTLOOK : The Normans return 39 players , including 19 starters . Quarterback Chris Wallace passed for 1 # 543 yards and 16 touchdowns in 1993 . Tackle Andrew Kline and tight_end Jeff Greenberg are NCAA Division I recruits . Venice Gondoliers COACHES : Kirk Alexander , Tony Chretin , 3rd year . 1993 RECORD : 9-3 ; 6-1 in Coastal Conference . OUTLOOK : After tying for the Western League title , the Gondoliers will have trouble matching last season ' s record because of the number of young players on the team . The Gondoliers have a strong offensive line anchored by center Kris DiGiaimo and tackle Chris McLeod . Mike Soto is the leading candidate to start at quarterback . St . Monica Mariners COACH : Norm Lacy , 4th year . 1993 RECORD : 8-3 ; 5-1 in Camino Real League . OUTLOOK : The Mariners return seven two-year starters from the 1993 Camino Real League tri-championship team . Steve Pulley makes the switch to quarterback after starting two seasons at wide receiver . Receivers Jason Jones and Dwight Carter are threats to catch the long pass .
